inputs.remark:
V1 缺少 MRI 结果。
V2 缺少 TMC 多学科评估。
V3 缺少 7个月 follow up 结果。

logic_summary: Added MRI to ordered_list and V1 tests.
Added V2 for TMC multidisciplinary assessment.

value.rationale_short: To rule out retrocochlear pathology and structural abnormalities given unilateral tinnitus and otalgia.

value.collective_interpretation: Multidisciplinary team assessment (TMC) identified somatic triggers (jaw/neck) and psychological factors.

tests.name: Audiology Assessment
tests.result_summary: Immediate relief from tinnitus using ear-level sound generators, Neuromonics, or music.

tests.name: Dentistry Assessment
tests.result_summary: Loudness changed with teeth clenching/jaw thrust; increased loudness and pain with masseter palpation.

tests.name: Neurology Assessment
tests.result_summary: Left C1 malrotation; significant somatic modulation with jaw/neck manipulation.

tests.name: Physical Therapy Assessment
tests.result_summary: Increased tinnitus loudness with jaw movements/neck rotation; poor posture.

tests.name: Tinnitus Handicap Inventory (THI)
tests.result_summary: Score: 12/100 (statistically significant reduction from baseline of 78/100).

tests.name: Subjective Report
tests.result_summary: Patient reported she was 'no longer bothered by the tinnitus'; complete resolution of left ear otalgia.
